about_the_game:
Introducing the Dodge It! 3 - Wilderness DLC, a thrilling expansion that brings three adventurous new maps to the game! Get ready to dodge, survive, and level up as you explore these unique terrains:

- Camp Base: A rugged military training ground where your reflexes will be pushed to the limit. Navigate through tactical obstacles while dodging deadly red balls and collecting green ones to climb the ranks.

- Volcano: A fiery challenge awaits in this molten environment. With lava flows and intense heat, dodging the red balls here is even more dangerous but the rewards are worth it!

- Canyon: Set against a dramatic rocky backdrop, the Canyon map adds narrow paths and steep cliffs to up the ante. Will you conquer this treacherous landscape or fall to your doom?

With more maps to come in future updates, the Wilderness DLC pushes your skills to new levels. Collect XP, level up, and prove your mastery in this exhilarating expansion. Can you reach #1 on the leaderboard and dominate the wilderness?

- Volcano: A fiery challenge awaits in this molten environment. With lava flows and intense heat, dodging the red balls here is even more dangerous but the rewards are worth it!

- Canyon: Set against a dramatic rocky backdrop, the Canyon map adds narrow paths and steep cliffs to up the ante. Will you conquer this treacherous landscape or fall to your doom?

With more maps to come in future updates, the Wilderness DLC pushes your skills to new levels. Collect XP, level up, and prove your mastery in this exhilarating expansion. Can you reach #1 on the leaderboard and dominate the wilderness?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gt
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: The Wilderness DLC for Dodge It! 3 introduces three exciting maps: Camp Base, Volcano, and Canyon. Dodge red balls and collect green ones in these rugged environments. Gain XP, level up, and climb the leaderboard in this action-packed 3D adventure. Can you become the top dodger?
